actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to require emergency position indicating radio beacons on uninspected United States fishing, fish processing and fish tender vessels.

summary.text: Amends the safety equipment requirements for uninspected United States fishing vessels to require that each uninspected fishing, fish processing, or fish tender vessel operating on the high seas be equipped with the prescribed number and type of emergency position indicating radio beacons.

titles.title: A bill to require emergency position indicating radio beacons on uninspected United States fishing, fish processing and fish tender vessels.
